parse.title: Federal Board of Intermediate and Secondary Education

text.*:
Federal Board of Intermediate and Secondary Education, Islamabad
وفاقی بورڈ برائے متوسط و ثانوی تعلیم، اسلام آباد
Agency overview
Formed 1975
Jurisdiction Federal government educational institutions of the Pakistan
Headquarters Islamabad
Website fbise.edu.pk

Federal Board of Intermediate and Secondary Education, (Urdu: وفاقی بورڈ برائے متوسط و ثانوی تعلیم، اسلام آباد‬‎) Islamabad, commonly known as FBISE, is a federal government board for examining the intermediate and secondary education in Pakistan and abroad for Pakistan International School. It is authorized with financial and administrative authority to organize, manage, regulate, develop and control intermediate and secondary education in general and accomplish examinations in the institutions affiliated with it.

Contents

  • 1 History
  • 2 Jurisdiction
  • 3 Activities
  • 4 Examination
  • 5 References
  • 6 External links

History[edit]

The federal board of intermediate and secondary education was established under the FBISE Act 1975.[1] The FBISE is an autonomous body of the Ministry of Federal Education and Professional Training.[2]

Jurisdiction[edit]

The Jurisdiction of the Federal Board of Intermediate and Secondary Education, Islamabad consists of the following:

  • Islamabad Capital Territory
  • Cantonments and Garrisons across the Pakistan
  • Gilgit Baltistan
  • Federally Administered Tribal Areas
  • Overseas Pakistanis (Pakistan International School)

Activities[edit]

  • Affiliate institutions imparting SSC and HSSC education within Pakistan and abroad.
  • Prescribe courses of instructions for SSC and HSSC.
  • Ensure provision of requisite facilities in the affiliated institutions.
  • Hold exams, appoint examiners and supervisory staff.
  • Institute measures to promote physical well being of students.

Examination[edit]

The FBISE board held the following exams both across Pakistan and also abroad for overseas Pakistanis:

  • Secondary School Certificate (SSC)
  • Higher Secondary School Certificate (HSSC)

References[edit]

  1. ^ https://www.fbise.edu.pk/introduction.php
  2. ^ http://www.moent.gov.pk

External links[edit]

  • FBISE official website
